title: Choose with care
brief_description: This is an information and training program designed to assist organisations establish a safe environment for the children and young people in their care such as child care centres, youth groups, sports clubs, before and after school care programs and all other organisations working with children and young people. It provides a proactive, preventative and participatory approach to building and maintaining child safe organisations. A comprehensive handbook is also included in this package.
